text: [Wo ceng shi] feng fucong su lai man [zhu] zhipei, feng zai shangwu [cong ri chu zhi zhengwu] xing yige yue de lucheng, zai xiawu [cong zhengwu zhi riluo] ye xing yige yue de lucheng [ji yitian hang liang ge yue de lucheng]. Wo wei ta er shi tong shui xiang quanshui yiyang liuchu. Youxie jingling feng ta de zhu de mingling zai ta [su lai man] mianqian gongzuo. Tamen zhong shei weibei wo de mingling, wo bi shi ta changshi liehuo de xingfa.
